concept.title: Hello World!
concept.shortdesc: The pre-configured Couchbase environment provides two ways to quickly get experience using Couchbase: begin building an application or start building interactive queries.

section.title: Build An Application
section.p: Jump straight to using your favorite language:
Java - .NET - Node.js - Go - PHP - Python - C

b.xref: Next Step: Start Using the SDK

section.p: New to NoSQL? Read the Developer's Intro to see how you can easily interact with documents through the command line.
Dig into a full featured web application by checking out the Couchbase Travel Sample Application.

section.title: Interactive Querying With N1QL
section.p: Use the built-in Query Workbench to immediately build SQL-like queries against JSON documents stored in Couchbase.
You can dig into using N1QL in other ways, see the First N1QL Query Tutorial.
